name: Astro: The Time Defender
description:
-- WARNING --

There is a problem were you are not able to see the whole game screen. While I try to fix this, I recommend playing the game in FULLSCREEN. Also, AUDIO BREAKS IN LEVEL 25.

I can't do anything about it at the moment because this game was submitted to a GameJam, but everything will definitely be FIXED IN A FUTURE UPDATE after the GameJam ends.

Thank you for understanding, I hope you still enjoy the game regardless of this errors. :)
~LoboBobo.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Astro the Time Defender is a fast 2D Platformer where your only enemy is time.

Play as Astro, a soldier who is on a mission to save his planet from a great danger.

You must get to the deepest area of the Distorted Space in order to eliminate the cause of the time-space distortion that is threatening your planet, the universe, and time itself.

Will you be able to succeed?

Made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2.
Thanks for playing!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoboBobo_Dev

Music By TeknoAXE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtgf00GvfFQVsYBA7V7RwU
